MV* | Emulators

Week Six.

Backbone. You make my life much easier.

Chip-8 Emulator

I have started working on a Chip-8 emulator. Getting the screen to draw was one of the most exciting things I’ve ever done.

Final Project

I have been thinking about my final project, and I’m learning towards a NES emulator. It turns out the Rails instructor has built a NES emulator in Lisp. This is great news.
